import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Button, DropdownButton, Dropdown } from "react-bootstrap"; const ContentListItem = (props) => { const [ressource, setRessource] = useState(""); const [list, setList] = useState([]); const getItems = async (ressource) => { const response = await fetch( `https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/item-category/${ressource}` ); const result = await response.json(); console.log(result); return result; }; const handleClick = (event, ressource) => { event.preventDefault(); setRessource(ressource); }; useEffect(() => { console.log(ressource); getItems(ressource).then((result) => setList(result)); }, [ressource]); getItems(); return ( <>
handleClick(event, "34")}> Standard balls handleClick(event, "33")}> Special balls handleClick(event, "39")}> Apricorn balls handleClick(event, "27")}> Healing handleClick(event, "28")}> PP recovery handleClick(event, "29")}> Revival handleClick(event, "30")}> Status cure handleClick(event, "3")}> Medecine handleClick(event, "2")}> Effort drop handleClick(event, "5")}> In a pinch handleClick(event, "6")}> Picky healing handleClick(event, "7")}> Type protection handleClick(event, "8")}> Baking only handleClick(event, "4")}> Other
); }; export default ContentListItem;
